meanings.definition: Of or relating to flags or banners.
meanings.sent1: The vexillar design on the flag was colorful and eye-catching.
meanings.sent2: The soldiers proudly carried the vexillar banner into battle.
meanings.sent3: The vexillar decorations at the party fluttered in the wind.
meanings.sent4: Her room was a vexillar display of different colored flags.
meanings.sent5: The vexillar symbol on the shield represented unity and strength.

meanings.sent1: The school's vexillar waved proudly in the wind.
meanings.sent2: During the parade, each country displayed its national vexillar.
meanings.sent3: The vexillar at the beach marked the spot for the family picnic.
meanings.sent4: The ship's vexillar fluttered in the breeze as it set sail.
meanings.sent5: The vexillar of the castle bore the royal crest.
